snippet: The C-1, being built by Lit Motors, is a gyroscope-equipped bike encased in a metal shell that is meant to provide the convenience of a motorcycle with the amenities of a car. Read more »

headline.main: A High-Tech Motorcycle With the Benefits of a Car
